requirements.heading: Certification Requirements
requirements.description: Prospective mutawif must meet the following requirements as a commitment to professionalism in accompanying Indonesian Umrah & Hajj and umrah pilgrims.
list: Minimum education of high school/MA or equivalent.
Able to communicate and guide pilgrims.
Submit administrative documents (ID card, diploma, passport photo, CV, and proof of experience).

process.title: Certification Process
process.description: Follow the certification flow from registration and document verification, self-assessment, competency test, result determination to certificate issuance.
steps: Participant registration and verification process of required document completeness.
Implementation of Self Assessment to measure participant readiness.
Implementation of Competency Test which includes practice observation or guidance simulation, in-depth interview sessions, and knowledge test related to the mutawif profession.
Determination and announcement of Competency Test results with Competent or Not Yet Competent status.
Issuance and delivery of Competency Certificate for participants declared competent.

profile.description1: LSP AHLAN is a <0>Professional Certification Institution</0> committed to improving the competency standards of mutawif in Indonesia. We collaborate with the <1>National Professional Certification Board (BNSP)</1> and the Ministry of Religious Affairs of the Republic of Indonesia to produce professional and competent worship guides.
